bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Definitions of Power Systems Data Transmission and Related Channel Terminology
IEEE Standard Definitions of Power Systems Data Transmission and Related Channel Terminology

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard includes definitions of those terms deemed necessary of performing or understanding measurements on channels used for data communications. terms that are applicable to audio interfaces of wireline, leased lines, and multi-channel equipments and baseband interfaces of multichannel equipment.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
